segments.text: This is a very spacious apartment . It's forty pings , including the parking space . That's about one thousand four hundred square feet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow . It's just the two of us . I don't know if we need that much room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You never know when two might turn into three .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you're right . And we'd like to have company anyway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly , which is why a three-bedroom is better . And look , there are two bathrooms .
segments.speaker: S1
